SEARCH
Package wordle

Class NewPlayerController

java.lang.Object
wordle.NewPlayerController
public class NewPlayerController extends Object
Controller class for creating a new player in the Wordle game application. Handles the logic for registering a new player and transitioning to the game or main menu.

  • Method Details

    • playerNameExists

      public boolean playerNameExists(String name, String pathName) throws IOException
      Searches for a player name in the player_list.csv file to check if the new player's player name already exists.
      Parameters:
      pathName - the filename of the csv file.
      Returns:
      true if the player name is found, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue reading from the file.

    • getNextPlayerId

      public int getNextPlayerId(String pathName)
      Reads the player list file to find the last used player ID and generates the next ID.
      Parameters:
      pathName - of the csv file.
      Returns:
      the next available player ID.

    • savePlayer

      public void savePlayer(String name, int id, String filename)
      Saves the new player's name and ID to the player list file.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player to save.
      id - The ID of the player to save.
      filename - of the csv file.

    • addPlayerBests

      public void addPlayerBests(int id, String filename)
      Initializes a new player's score records by adding an entry to the personal bests file.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the player for whom to initialize score records.
      filename - of the csv file.

    • onGoButtonClicked

      public void onGoButtonClicked() throws IOException
      Handles the action of clicking the 'Go' button. Creates a new player record and transitions to the level selection screen.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue loading the next screen or saving the player data.
